provideCompanyMemberEmail: Provide email of the company member
companyMemberEmailDesc: Provide the email address of the company member you would like to invite and press Space bar to add.
companyOwnerEmailDesc: Provide the email address of the account which will be the primary administrator of the company account.
changeCompanyOwnerEmailDesc: In order to change the email of the company owner you have to transfer the account ownership to a different account. To do that, please, check the Security Settings section.
namePronunciationDesc: Field is optional. This could be a phonetic pronunciation, or an example of something your name sounds like.
homeAddressDesc: Field is optional. You may provide here your home address where you are currently located
homePhoneDesc: Field is optional. You may provide your home phone number.
passRulesNotFollowed: Wrong password format. Not all rules are followed!
wrongPassFormatOrMiss: Wrong password format or password mismatch

passwordRules.eightChars: Password length should be more than 8 characters
passwordRules.lower: Password should contain at least one lowercase character
passwordRules.spec: Password should contain at least one special character
passwordRules.digit: Password should contain at least one digit character
passwordRules.upper: Password should contain at least one uppercase character

resendCodeIn: You can resend SMS in {{ time }} sec{{ s }}.
resendEmailIn: You can resend email in {{ time }} sec{{ s }}
phoneInvalidFormat: Phone invalid format. Make sure the phone number matches the format (+1234567890)
phoneInputDescription: Make sure you provided phone number with country code. Once you have got a message on your phone, provide the 6-digit code into the input field below.
resetPassInputDesc: Confirmation link will be sent to provided email address, if the account with this email address exists. Link will be valid for 24h, make sure you will reset password in this period of time.
fieldRequired: Field is required in order to continue
companyLocationDesc: Provide the physical (if possible) address of the company. Otherwise, provide the address where company is registered.
locationError: Min length of the location is 8 symbols, max is 128 symbols.
companyDesc: Provide the full and valid official name of the company
companyError: Min length of the company name is 2 symbols, max is 64 symbols.
websiteDesc: Should be FQDN. Provide the URL of the website that is associated with the company.
emailChangeInfo: Email can be changed from the security settings. Be careful! You are allowed to change the email only one time.
copied: Message has been successfully copied to the clipboard
passphraseDesc: Passphrase can be anything, it will be used to encrypt recovery keys.
passphraseError: Min length of passphrase is 8 symbols, max is 128
providePassphraseDesc: Provide the passphrase that was used while generating recovery keys (not the account password)
accDeletionFullName: In order to delete an account provide your full name (first name and last name).
newCompanyOwnerEmailPlaceholder: Provide the company new owner email address
newCompanyOwnerEmailDesc: In order to continue, please, make sure that the provided email is the company member with confirmed account
companyMemberEmailModifyDesc: You cannot modify the email address of the user. This action must be performed by the user themself.
provideCompanyMemberNamePronunciation: Provide company member name pronunciation (for instance, Zoe ('zo-ee'))
companyMemberNamePronunciationDesc: Field is optional. This could be a phonetic pronunciation, or an example of something the name sounds like.
companyMemberHomeAddressDesc: Field is optional. You may provide here your home address where the company member is currently located.
companyMemberHomePhoneDesc: Field is optional. You may provide company member home phone number.
provideNewRoleName: Provide the name of the new role
provideNewRoleNameDesc: Provide the name of the role that will be displayed on the screen.
newRoleNameError: Min length of the new role name is 2 symbols, max is 64 symbols.
provideNewRoleDescription: Provide the description of the new role
provideNewRoleDescriptionDesc: The description of the role is needed for you in order to know for what this role is created and who should be assignee.
newRoleDescriptionError: Min length of the new role description is 2 symbols, max is 128 symbols.
provideRoleNameDesc: Provide the name of the role that will be displayed on the screen.
roleNameError: Min length of the new role name is 2 symbols, max is 64 symbols.
provideRoleDescriptionDesc: The description of the role is needed for you in order to know for what this role is created and who should be assignee.
roleDescriptionError: Min length of the new role description is 2 symbols, max is 128 symbols.
provideNewRoleAssignee: Provide assignee for the new role
newRoleAssigneeDesc: In order to create new role, you need to assignee it to at least one user in your company.
contactEmailDesc: Provide the email that we can use in order to reach out back to you
contactMessageDesc: Write whatever you want. We will be glad to talk!
wrongContactMessage: Wrong contact message length. Should be between 2 and 1024.
productPlaceholder: For example: New Fancy Ford Mustang
productInputDesc: This is going to be the main title of the product that everyone is going to see.
productError: The length of the title should be between 16 and 70.
productDescriptionPlaceholder: Write here a couple of words of important information that would be useful for someone who is going to purchase your product.
productDescriptionError: The length of the product description should be between 40 and 9000 characters.
contactPersonPlaceholder: Provide the name of the contact person
contactPersonInputDesc: In case if you are contacted about product you are offering, let people know how they can talk to you.
contactPersonError: The length of the name of the contact person should be between 1 and 64.
productContactEmailInputDesc: Your email address may be used to contact you.
productPhoneInputDesc: Your contact phone number might be required for the potential customer to contact you.
productPricePlaceholder: Provide the price of the product
productPriceInputDesc: This is going to be what amount of money you want for your product. Don't forget to select the proper currency!
productPriceError: The price cannot be a negative number
productLocationPlaceholder: Provide the location of the product
productLocationInputDesc: Provide the location of the product or the service that you are going to post.
productLocationError: The length of the product location should be between 4 and 64
searchForProductsPlaceholder: Provide any data about your product in order to find it
searchForProductsInputDesc: You can perform the search of your products based on title, description or slug.
priceFromInputDesc: The minimal price in the range of searched products.
priceFromError: Wrong minimal price! Make sure it is not a negative number.
priceToInputDesc: The maximum price in the range of searched products.
priceToError: Wrong maximum price! Make sure it is not a negative number.
marketplaceSearchLabel: Search for whatever goods you want
marketplaceSearchPlaceholder: Provide the query for the product
marketplaceSearchInputDesc: The search of the product will be based on the name, category, subcategory, description, title and slug.
favoriteProductsSearchInputDesc: You can perform the search of your products based on title, description or slug.
clickToCopy: Click on the input field in order to copy.
companyMemberSearchEmailPlaceholder: Search for members of your company
companyMemberSearchInputDesc: Search for company members using first and last name
companyEmployeeInputDesc: Search company employee based on email, first name or last name
